mapper.select: SELECT 'SEL' AS CD , '선택' AS CD_NM , 'KwdKnd' AS GRP_CD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CD , CD_NM , GRP_CD FROM TM_CD_INF WHERE GRP_CD = 'KwdKnd' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT 'ALL' AS CLASS_CD , '전체' AS CLASS_NAME , 'ALL' AS FINANCE_CD , '전체' AS FINANCE_NAME , '' AS BUSI_STRT_DAY , '' AS BUSI_END_DAY FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CLASS_CD , (SELECT CLASS_NAME FROM RR_FINANCE_CLASS WHERE CLASS_CD = A.CLASS_CD) AS CLASS_NAME , FINANCE_CD , FINANCE_NAME , BUSI_STRT_DAY , BUSI_END_DAY FROM RR_FINANCE A WHERE FINANCE_CD = '9999999' UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.CLASS_CD , A.CLASS_NAME , B.FINANCE_CD , B.FINANCE_NAME , B.BUSI_STRT_DAY , B.BUSI_END_DAY FROM ( SELECT CLASS_CD , CLASS_NAME , CLASS_LEVEL , UPPER_CLASS FROM RR_FINANCE_CLASS START WITH CLASS_CD='050000' CONNECT BY PRIOR CLASS_CD=UPPER_CLASS ) A, RR_FINANCE B WHERE A.CLASS_CD=B.CLASS_CD
AND A.UPPER_CLASS IN ('050100', '050200')
AND A.UPPER_CLASS=#{cls_cd}
AND NVL(#{sdate}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) BETWEEN B.BUSI_STRT_DAY AND B.BUSI_END_DAY
ORDER BY FINANCE_NAME )
